description: By providing the ARN (Amazon Resource Name), this API returns the gateway.

parameters.name: GatewayArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway.

nested_items.name: GatewayArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: GatewayDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the gateway.

nested_items.name: GatewayType
nested_items.description: The type of the gateway type.

nested_items.name: HypervisorId
nested_items.description: The hypervisor ID of the gateway.

nested_items.name: LastSeenTime
nested_items.description: Details showing the last time Backup gateway communicated with the cloud, in Unix format and UTC time.

nested_items.name: MaintenanceStartTime
nested_items.description: Returns your gateway's weekly maintenance start time including the day and time of the week. Note that values are in terms of the gateway's time zone. Can be weekly or monthly.

nested_items.name: DayOfMonth
nested_items.description: The day of the month component of the maintenance start time represented as an ordinal number from 1 to 28, where 1 represents the first day of the month and 28 represents the last day of the month.

nested_items.name: DayOfWeek
nested_items.description: An ordinal number between 0 and 6 that represents the day of the week, where 0 represents Sunday and 6 represents Saturday. The day of week is in the time zone of the gateway.

nested_items.name: HourOfDay
nested_items.description: The hour component of the maintenance start time represented as hh, where hh is the hour (0 to 23). The hour of the day is in the time zone of the gateway.

nested_items.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_items.description: The minute component of the maintenance start time represented as mm, where mm is the minute (0 to 59). The minute of the hour is in the time zone of the gateway.

nested_items.name: NextUpdateAvailabilityTime
nested_items.description: Details showing the next update availability time of the gateway.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpoint
nested_items.description: The DNS name for the virtual private cloud (VPC) endpoint the gateway uses to connect to the cloud for backup gateway.
